alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Gosper; Harlan; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Phelps, Gosper, Furnas and western Harlan Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 543 AM CDT, Doppler radar and automated weather stations reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area to near Holbrook to near Wilsonville. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Doppler Radar and Automated Weather Stations. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Arapahoe around 600 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Elwood, Edison, Oxford, Smithfield, Bertrand, Orleans and Atlanta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
